What is the significance of the new RPC API, `getcurrencyconverters`, on the Verus testnet?

The new RPC API, `getcurrencyconverters`, enables instant queries of any full node for all registered currencies above a fixed liquidity threshold that contain one or more reserve currencies. This allows wallets or applications to easily query the entire blockchain network of fractional currencies, determine which provides the best conversion rate at acceptable liquidity, and either convert at the best possible rates worldwide or select only better-than-market rates and arbitrage to earn.
